EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.POL.none.N.G.N.9216.FN POL.Email 11 - Better. Cheaper. Faster. Yes,
EmailTemplate.subject: Better. Cheaper. Faster. Yes, your LAN can have it all!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Choose the best technology for your LAN Ethernet-over-copper LANs are approaching the end of their life and sooner, rather than later, it will be time to give your organization better performance at a lower cost. But it’s a tough decision to give up a faithful technology for something new. That’s why you want to be sure you have chosen the best option.
Nokia is a world leader in passive optical networking technology, enabling you to be the best in yours.
Visit our website to learn more about how Passive Optical LAN can give your users – and your balance sheet – a boost. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
